articles.title: Dirco DG on precautionary suspension over R118m paid for 'non-existent' land - TimesLIVE
articles.description: International relations and co-operation director-general Kgabo Mohoai has been placed on precautionary suspension after the department spent R118m of taxpayers' money on a piece of land in New York that did not exist.
